title: Healthy mini pizzas
description: A spelt flour pizza with three delicious flavour combinations to choose from. The pizza toppings ingredients below are per mini pizza, so double or quadruple the ingredients, as necessary.Each mini pizza provides 168 kcal, 5.4g protein, 29.5g carbohydrate (of which 2.7g sugars), 3.4g fat (of which 1.2g saturates), 2.4g fibre and 0.4g salt per portion.
ingredients: 285g/9¼oz white spelt flour, plus extra for dusting
1 tbsp fresh oregano or 1 tsp dried oregano
20g/¾oz buffalo mozzarella, torn into small pieces
3 strips of lemon rind, finely sliced
3 garlic cloves, roasted and squeezed out of the skins
